FrageText.de: Was wird durch die Zusatztafel angezeigt?
FrageText.en: What is indicated by this supplementary sign?
FrageText.sl: Kaj je prikazano z dopolnilno tablo?

de.Text: Ich habe an der Kreuzung den Vorrang
Das Rechts- und Linksabbiegen ist verboten

en.Text: I have the right of way at the intersection
The intersecting street is a right of way street
Turning right and left is prohibited
An intersection with a rail vehicle

hr.Text: Poprečna cesta je cesta s prednošću prolaska
Skretanje udesno i ulijevo je zabranjeno

sl.Text: Zavijanje na desno in levo je prepovedano

tr.Text: Sağdan ve soldan gelen yol öncelikli bir yoldur
